intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Coastal Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service. It provides detailed descriptions of all Level 5 LC/LU classes specific to coastal environments, including their geographic characteristics, input datasets, and interpretation methods. The guideline aims to ensure consistency and accuracy in mapping coastal zones, aligning with the EU Biodiversity Strategy to 2020 and ensuring compatibility with other European LC/LU products.
